name: Grilled and Peppered Snail

name: Oven Dried Snail
aboutDish: The Oven Dried Snail provides sufficient satisfaction to the body and mouth. It keeps the chin going for a certain amount of time and releases the nutrients into the mouth.

name: Fresh Snail
aboutDish: Fresh, Clean and Parboiled Snail is available through us. This offers the chance to prepare the snail in your own preferred manner and procedure.

name: Live Snail
aboutDish: It is know to have quality snails from Ade Farm Snails. Using proven methods, we grow our snails. We supply you with Live Snails directly from our farm.
